subject: Politics
title: Debt as a Political Tool
description: A quick win: understand Debt as a Political Tool.

hook.text: Greece owed more than it could ever repay. Germany dictated its budget. Debt turned a democracy into a ward.

buildup.text: Sovereign debt gives lenders power over borrowers. Indebted nations lose economic sovereignty.

discovery.text: China lends billions to developing nations. When they can't repay, China gains ports, mines, and influence.

twist.text: US debt tops $33 trillion. But because the dollar is the world's reserve currency, markets keep lending.

climax.text: Debt crises are political crises. Austerity sparks protests. Default destroys credibility. There are no easy exits.

punchline.text: Debt is a leash. Borrowers think they're free until the leash tightens.

quiz.question: Why can the US sustain massive debt levels?
options: The dollar is the world's reserve currency so markets keep lending
The US has no international creditors
US debt is automatically forgiven every decade
